title: Ayurveda Archives | VitSupp
description: Ayurvedic medicine is a system of Hindu traditional medicine of Vedic tradition native to the Indian subcontinent, and a form of alternative medicine. Ayurveda is well integrated into the Indian National health care system, with state hospitals for Ayurveda established across the country.

Ayurveda is well integrated into the Indian National health care system, with state hospitals for Ayurveda established across the country.
